function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of COVID-19 in cities and countries","Impact":"Significant disruption to global mobility and supply chains, changes in urban life, and impact on urban resilience and sustainability","Mitigation":"Implementation of travel restrictions, quarantines, and other public health measures; adaptation of urban governance and management in response to pandemics","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing facilities, data analytics for monitoring and predicting disease spread","People":"Residents of cities and countries, travelers, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, urban planners"},{"Description":"Potential for recurring public-health emergencies in modern cities and society","Impact":"Continued disruption to urban life, sustainability, and resilience, and challenges in managing future pandemics","Mitigation":"Investment in public health infrastructure, preparedness planning for pandemics, and urban experimentation to test crisis response strategies","Technologies":"Advanced healthcare facilities, telemedicine, remote monitoring systems, early warning and detection systems","People":"Residents of cities, public health officials, urban planners, government authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, government authorities, urban planners"}]}
